mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (emp_id, emp_name, nrc, phone, email, dob, rank, department, address, checkdelete, image) VALUES (#{emp_id}, #{emp_name}, #{nrc}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{dob}, #{rank}, #{dep}, #{address}, #{checkdelete}, #{image});
mapper.select: SELECT emp_id, emp_name, nrc, phone, email, dob, rank, department, address, checkdelete, image FROM employee ORDER BY emp_id ASC;
SELECT emp_id, emp_name, nrc, phone, email, dob, rank, department, address, image FROM employee WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id};
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET emp_name = #{emp_name}, nrc=#{nrc}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, dob=#{dob}, rank=#{rank}, department=#{dep}, checkdelete=#{checkdelete}, address=#{address} WHERE emp_id=#{emp_id};
